awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 5 wins & 12 nominations.

fullplot: Anna is a young widow who is finally getting on with her life after the death of her husband, Sean. Now engaged to be married, Anna meets a ten-year-old boy who tells her he is Sean reincarnated. Though his story is both unsettling and absurd, Anna can't get the boy out of her mind. And much to the concern of her fiancèe, her increased contact with him leads her to question the choices she has made in her life.
plot: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.
title: Birth

tomatoes.consensus: A well-mounted production is undermined by a muddled, absurd storyline of questionable taste.
